collection:
**Information Collection and Use:** When you interact with our GPTs
(chatbots), we do not collect, share, or sell any data.

**Contact Form Data Collection and Use** : When you contact us through our
contact form, you will be asked to provide your name and email address.

**Children's Privacy:** Our website and services are not intended for children
under the age of 13, and we do not knowingly collect data from this age group.
